<h2>Strong 2&clubs;</h2>
; <span style="color: green">&ouml;:</span> 2&clubs; ww/ a balanced hand
: <span style="color: green">&ouml;:</span> 2&clubs; &rArr; 2NT, ww/ 21-22HCP
: <span style="color: green">&ouml;:</span> 2&clubs; &rArr; 3NT, ww/ 25-17HCP, w/o 5 major suit

; 2&clubs; ww/ 4-4-4-1 hand pattern (not in suit rank order)
: <span style="color: green">&ouml;:</span> 2&clubs; &rArr; singleton suit 

; 2&clubs; ww/
: <span style="color: green">&ouml;:</span> 21+HCP, or 
: <span style="color: green">&ouml;:</span> 16+HCP w/ 8 winners w/ a major trump or 
: <span style="color: green">&ouml;:</span> 16+HCP w/ 9 winners w/ a minor trump,
:: <span style="color: green">&ouml;:</span> excluding 23-24HCP w/ balanced hand (2NT)



* Response to 2&clubs;:
** <span style="color: orange">&real;:</span> &rArr; 2&diams; ww/ 0-7HCP

::: <span style="color: green">&ouml;:</span> &rArr; 3NT for 27-28HCP

** <span style="color: green">&ouml;:</span> 11-15HCP

* <span style="color: orange">&real;:</span> 3&hearts;/3&spades; ww/ 11-12SP and 8+fit; Invitation

* <span style="color: orange">&real;:</span> 4&hearts;/4&spades; good fit; closing
* <span style="color: orange">&real;:</span> 2NT ww/ 13+HCP: pattern query

** <span style="color: green">&ouml;:</span> 3&spades; ww/ 5 &spades; (5-6-x-x)

<h2>Pre-emptive opening</h2>
* 2/3-Law:- Down 3 or 2 when vulnerable;
* ww/HCP: 6-10 strictly; no excuse!
* 1-A's

<h3>Preemptive Weak 2</h3>
* <span style="color: green">&ouml;:</span> 2&hearts;/&spades; -- ww/ a 6-suit +:
::2/3-Law translates to 5 winning suits or 6 when vulnerable
::ww/o side 5-suit, or 4-major-suit, or voids -- don't quite understand!!

<h3>Preemptive Weak 3</h3>
* <span style="color: green">&ouml;:</span> 3&clubs;/&diams;/&hearts;/&spades; -- ww/ a 7-suit +:
::2/3-Law translates to 6 winning suits or 7 when vulnerable
::Voids are okay

<h3>Preemptive 4-Major</h3>
* <span style="color: green">&ouml;:</span> 4&hearts;/&spades; -- ww/ 8-10HCP, a half-strong 8-suit w/ 7 winners (8 when vulnerable), 0-1 Ace.
* <span style="color: green">&ouml;:</span> 4&clubs;/&diams; Preemptive Major Transfer: -- ww/ 11-15HCP, a strong 8-suit or 7-suit + 1 Ace/King in a site suit.
** <span style="color: orange">&real;:</span> 4&hearts;/&spades; when no Slam interest
** <span style="color: orange">&real;:</span> Anything else means Slam seeking; e.g.:
*** <span style="color: orange">&real;:</span> 4&diams;/4&hearts; (Cue bid); or 
*** <span style="color: orange">&real;:</span> 4NT (Blackwood)
